name: Sumaúma (Djovans)
description:
Inspired by the legend of the guardian tree of the Amazon Rainforest that bears the same name as the game, Sumaúma has the duty to protect its forest against the Fire that wants to consume it at all costs to increase its longevity, sending its minions to do so. 

The fire burned a good part of the forest, this caused several species to die during it, so the Guardian Tree sends its guardians to fight the enemies and collect the souls of the species affected by the deadly fire. 

In this 3D platform game, your goal is to fight the Spirits of Fire, go through the dangers of a devastated Amazon Rainforest and find the souls of Amazonian species in order to deliver them to the big Kapok tree.
